short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Learn a new language on autopilot. Practice new vocabulary while you browse the web.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Busy people use LazyWords to build up their vocabulary and practice on autopilot. You should too.

Learn Spanish, English, Portuguese, Italian, and over 40 other languages.

LazyWords is a Google Chrome extension that helps you learn and practice a new language while you read your favorite blogs or news.

You can also get LazyWords for iPhone and Android on our web.

Reviews:

- "I've been using LazyWords for a while now and love it. It's helped me reinforce some words I only recently learned and introduced me to some new ones. It's a nice, easy way to supplement everything else I do to learn Hebrew. I highly recommend it!"

- "Really cool app; I'll share it with my students."
